sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import Skeleton from 'react-loading-skeleton' import Moment from 'react-moment' import { Baseurl } from '../baseurl' const CourseReview = ({code}) => { const [review, setReview] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${Baseurl}coursereview`, { params:{code:code} }).then((res) => { if (res.data) { setReview(res.data) console.log(res.data) } }) }, []) return ( <> {/*
Reviews ({review.length})
{review.length ? review.map((item, index)=>{ return( <>
{item.lastname} : {item.review}
) }):}
*/}
